quest.name: Tracks in the Snow
journal: Emmanellain is, as usual, milling about aimlessly.
objectives: Search for footprints in the snow.
Search for more footprints in the snow.
Speak with the girl in green.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: I've never thought myself much of an explorer, though I suppose my adventures have taken me to all sorts of strange and distant places. With that in mind, traversing an ice field should be a simple feat!

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: So, it's into the Eblan Rime we go. But where do we even start looking in such a place?

dialogue.name: EMMANELLAIN
dialogue.text: What ho, chums! Been given something to do, have you? As it happens, I too have been ordered to make myself useful!

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Sounds like rather a tall order...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Ahem. Since you ask, we're to scour the Eblan Rime for survivors.

dialogue.name: EMMANELLAIN
dialogue.text: What!? Wander around ice fields on the off chance you'll find someone!?

dialogue.name: EMMANELLAIN
dialogue.text: You'd take forever to finish the job without the benefit of my expertise─or more specifically, my telescope! Come friends, I know just the spot to begin our search!

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: ...I'll probably regret this, but we may as well humor him.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: The few buildings I can see don't appear to be residences. They may still warrant investigation, though.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: I'm surprised by how many wild beasts there are roaming about the place. Perhaps now that the soldiers have gone, they're free to wander and forage as they please.

dialogue.name: EMMANELLAIN
dialogue.text: I spy with my little telescope...

dialogue.name: EMMANELLAIN
dialogue.text:
A massive...sheep-thing? Or maybe it's a cow? Not what we're after, either way.
...Is that an aether current? Ah, no, just a wind sprite.

dialogue.name: EMMANELLAIN
dialogue.text: Hmm... Other than that, it's all snow, snow, snow. But lo! What do I see o'er yon hillock?

dialogue.name: EMMANELLAIN
dialogue.text: There's no mistaking it. That's a girl.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: A survivor!? Show me!

dialogue.name: EMMANELLAIN
dialogue.text: Over there, behind that tree. It looks like she's running away from something...though surely not us? She wouldn't even know we're here unless she had a telescope like mine.

dialogue.name: EMMANELLAIN
dialogue.text: All I can tell...is that...she's wearing a pale green dress...a rather fetching one, at that!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: She'll be long gone by the time we get anywhere near, but we should be able to follow her footprints.

dialogue.name: EMMANELLAIN
dialogue.text: I'll let Lucia know where you're heading.

dialogue.name: EMMANELLAIN
dialogue.text: Oh, and take these warming tinctures with you!

dialogue.name: EMMANELLAIN
dialogue.text: The poor girl must be chilled to the bone, if not on the verge of freezing to death.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: That's...actually very thoughtful. Thank you. But won't you need some for yourself?

dialogue.name: EMMANELLAIN
dialogue.text: No, no! I'll be fine! As a man of chivalry, my honor demands I do no less. And lest we forget, the very reason we are here is to protect those in need.

dialogue.name: EMMANELLAIN
dialogue.text: Now go, and godsspeed!

dialogue.name: EMMANELLAIN
dialogue.text: Why are you still here!? If you dally any longer, you will miss your chance to play the hero!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: A trail of fresh footprints lead east...

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: According to the label here, this place was used by those involved with extracting ceruleum...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Hmm... Other than the footprints, I see no signs of recent activity.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: These footprints appear to be the same as those you saw previously, and they lead towards the building...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: We're getting closer. I'm sure of it.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: At first, we thought she'd gone inside the building, but the door doesn't look to have been opened in some time.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: She might still be nearby, so we'll keep looking around here.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Then again, it's also possible that she ran right past this place. Would you mind searching up ahead?

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: As Emmanellain said, it's highly unlikely she was running away from us.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Even so, we mustn't do anything to startle her. For all she knows, we're soldiers of an invading army, so we need to be careful not to give the wrong impression.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The girl in the green dress anxiously surveys her surroundings.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Were you to call out to her from this distance, it might attract wild beasts to your location. It would be safer to get closer first, but you must do so without drawing her attention.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Follow the girl from a safe distance.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The objective will end in failure if you are noticed. Make use of cover such as rocks to approach her without being seen.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Similarly, the objective will also end in failure if you fall too far behind.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Should you fail to complete the objective, you may try again by returning to the designated location.

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: Attempt to follow the girl in green again?

dialogue.name: LICINIA
dialogue.text: Phew... Still in one piece...

dialogue.name: LICINIA
dialogue.text: Wh-Who are you!?

dialogue.name: LICINIA
dialogue.text: Stay back! This house is packed with explosives! Take another step and I'll blow this place sky-high!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Please! We just want to talk!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: I'm Alphinaud. This is my sister, Alisaie, and our good friend Forename.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: We have no intention of hurting or taking anything from you or anyone else. I give you my word.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: We and our comrades have come to provide aid to the people of Garlemald─

dialogue.name: LICINIA
dialogue.text: Aid!? You savages are the ones responsible for all of this! You did this to us!

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: We didn't, I promise you. One of the other reasons we came was to find out what happened here, in fact.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: The Telophoroi are the ones to blame. They're the ones who laid waste to Garlemald, and they won't stop until they've destroyed the entire world. They're the enemy─our enemy.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: On our way, we encountered imperial soldiers who had been made their thralls. Those poor souls are now in our care, and we are striving to cure them of their affliction.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: You're the first person we've met who wasn't already enslaved... How were you able to escape the Telophoroi's influence? Are there any others like you?

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: ...I'm sorry, I don't mean to overwhelm you. Let's start with introductions. Can you tell me your name?

dialogue.name: LICINIA
dialogue.text: (-Licinia-)I...my name's Licinia. As for how I've managed to stay sane...

dialogue.name: LICINIA
dialogue.text: (-Licinia-)I've been asking myself the same question. Ever since that night...and the roar, that terrible roar... And then the screams. I was screaming too, I think. I'm not sure. I can't remember.

dialogue.name: LICINIA
dialogue.text: (-Licinia-)Then came the silence. Everything was still.

dialogue.name: LICINIA
dialogue.text: (-Licinia-)It was like...waking up from a nightmare. I thought that maybe the fighting had stopped, so I stepped outside...

dialogue.name: LICINIA
dialogue.text: (-Licinia-)If your hells are real, I saw one that day.

dialogue.name: LICINIA
dialogue.text: (-Licinia-)I ran...past friends, people I'd known all my life. Eyes vacant. Dead. Staring at the sky.

dialogue.name: LICINIA
dialogue.text: (-Licinia-)Others were mad and violent. I saw them struggle with soldiers, but didn't stay to watch. I fled, as far as my legs would take me.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Do you have family here? Is this their home?

dialogue.name: LICINIA
dialogue.text: (-Licinia-)No, this is Victors' Spoils. A mansion for retired soldiers. Or it was, but now me and my─me and a few others are, um, borrowing it.

dialogue.name: LICINIA
dialogue.text: (-Licinia-)As for the explosives...I was making that up.

dialogue.name: LICINIA
dialogue.text: (-Licinia-)I just wanted to keep everyone else safe, and I didn't know if you were... <sigh> The truth is, our supplies are running low. You said you're here to help. Can you?

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Of course! Whatever assistance we can provide, we will.

dialogue.name: LICINIA
dialogue.text: (-Licinia-)Thank you. I'd better tell the others first, though. Wait here.

dialogue.name: LICINIA
dialogue.text: (-Licinia-)This is everyone.

dialogue.name: WEAKENEDGARLEAN
dialogue.text: Licinia says you can be trusted...but these are desperate times. We'd be fools to let foreign troops into our home.

dialogue.name: WEAKENEDGARLEAN
dialogue.text: Having said that...were you to provide us with means of heating the place─as a sign of goodwill─perhaps we could take you at your word...

dialogue.name: WEAKENEDGARLEAN
dialogue.text: If that is too much to ask, then leave us be.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Time to put my firewood-gathering skills to use. Could you provide the spark with a little magic, Alisaie?

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: We'll have a fire burning in no time. May we build it under that gazebo?

dialogue.name: WEAKENEDGARLEAN
dialogue.text: The what...? Oh, you mean the bower. Yes, yes, do as you will.

dialogue.name: LICINIA
dialogue.text: (-Licinia-)...
